extendedInfo.description: AAA Tether is a simple-to-use application to make your Android phone as a wireless hotspot to share the Internet connection with your PC and other Wi-Fi devices.It does not require root.How to use:1. Touch the grey Android and it becomes green.2. Simply use a PC, a tablet, a MAC, a PSP, an xBox or whatever WiFi device to scan for "AAA Tether" and connect to it.3. You can now surf freely.Click here for downloading the pro version:http://goo.gl/7uAEwPLEASE, DON'T RATE WITH ONE STAR BEFORE CONTACTING US TO REPORT AN ERROR. THIS APPLICATION DOES NOT WORK ON EVERY PHONE BECAUSE OF DIFFERENT RESTRICTIONS OF YOUR MOBILE CARRIERS. WE ARE ALWAYS DEVELOPING HARD TO HELP FIND GOOD SOLUTIONS TO GET EVERYONE CAPABLE TO DO TETHERING WITHOUT ROOT. PLEASE JUST REPORT US YOUR ISSUE IN AN EMAIL AND WE WILL LOOK INTO IT. A COMMENT LIKE "Doesn't work, useless, or fail" DOES NOT HELP OTHER USERS OR THE DEVELOPERS.THANK YOU FOR YOUR KINDNESS.Keywords: Wi-Fi, Tether, Wi-Fi Tethering, USB Tethering, Bluetooth Tethering, Hotspot, WiFi Hotspot, WiFi Tethering, Mobile Data Plan, 3G, Internet

reviews.title: Misleading title and description,  this is NOT free.
reviews.comment: This is really just yet another free shortcut to your phone\'s built in wifi hotspot tethering,  which will most likely charge you a monthly fee.  It does not offer free tethering without rooting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CRAP!!!!!!
